attributes.action: Cancel all exams for the rest of the academic year
attributes.additional_details: We would like the Government or Parliament to enforce cancelling all exams in this academic year due to the stress and anxiety of the ongoing pandemic.The ability to focus or concentrate is affected in addition to the growing fears of the Corona-virus. having students sits test will result in more spread of the virus.We hope to come to an agreement as soon as possible in a timely manner.
attributes.background: We would like the government and  Rt Hon Gavin Williamson  Secretary of State for Education to at least consider how students and parents are feeling at such a stressful time, there should be an ongoing discussion on how students can be supported.

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual educational institutions, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
